title: Aarya Diamond Floral Stud Earrings - Manoharam Kammlu
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (approx. 9.51 ct total diamond weight)
Secure Post and Butterfly Closure. Boasts a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These captivating stud earrings feature a floral motif crafted with intricate gold filigree and embellished with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the diamonds' brilliance. A modern interpretation of traditional Telugu floral motifs, lending a touch of heritage to contemporary styles.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with shimmering white diamonds
creating a classic and elegant color palette.
occasions: or to add a touch of sparkle to any outfit. A beautiful gift for anniversaries
or any celebration of a loved one.
description: These earrings are a testament to the perfect blend of modern design and traditional artistry. The floral motif adds a touch of timeless elegance, while the brilliant-cut diamonds provide unparalleled sparkle. Crafted from high-quality 18K gold and meticulously set diamonds, these earrings are a durable and cherished investment. The classic design ensures versatility, making them suitable for any occasion.
